name: NEVADA CLASSICURE LA LED-UV YELLOW (PY9825)
description: NEVADA CLASSICURE LA LED-UV YELLOW (PY9825) is a special wax free inks which is specially formulated for Semi Rotary label presses equipped with LED-UV curing systems, including machines with Anilox inking. They accept foil stampable UV lacquers and hence are suitable for use with most foil stamping products. To compliment this series we are able to offer Nevada Classicure Basic spot colors in the same LA formulation.
